short_summary: Request for Proposal for the acquisition of an Snow Blower for CSC Atlantic
description: The Public Service and Procurement Canada, on behalf of The Correctional Service Canada, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of an Snow blower for CSC Atlantic in Renous, NB.
duration_in_months: Do whatever you want with this data.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Snow Blower Acquisition

**Title/Titre:** 21207-249736 Snow Blower/Souffleuse à Neige

**Reference Number/Référence:** WS4316941761-Doc4332466775

**Publication Date/Date de publication:** 2023-12-01
**Tender Closing Date/Appel Offres Date Cloture:** 2023-12-19T14:00:00

**Acquisition Details:**

* The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a snow blower for CSC Atlantic in Renous, New Brunswick.
* The procurement category is Goods and Services/GD.

**Selection Criteria:**

* The contract will be awarded based on the Selection Criteria of Lowest Price.

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Deadline for Bidding/ Déeadline pour présentation de candidature:**

* The RFP will close on 2023-12-19T14:00:00.

**How to Bid/ Comment soumettre une candidature:**

* Bidders interested in this opportunity should visit the Canada Publications web site at [Ariba Company](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18166304?extsite=MTgxNjYzMDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
* The bidder's name, address, and bidder identification number must be included on each offer.

**Important:**

* Bids must be submitted electronically.
* Late bids will not be accepted.

**Contact Information:**

* Leger2, Lyne
* Email: lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Thank you for letting me help! Please let me know who you would like me to
format it for next time. Best regards, [your name]
